name: Cowboy Martini
description: Do cowboys go for mint and lemon in their gin? Maybe not, but this drink from James Stuart of The Trilby is deliciously fresh and puckeringly tart.

recipeInstructions.text: Place mint leaves in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shake well.
Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Float a mint leaf on top for garnish and serve immediately.
